report.title: Explore samples using standard filters
report.description: Explore samples with standardised filtering parameters.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false JOIN websites w on w.id=su.website_id and w.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (sample_attribute_values savrecorder JOIN sample_attributes sarecorder on sarecorder.id=savrecorder.sample_attribute_id and sarecorder.deleted=false and sarecorder.system_function='full_name' ) on savrecorder.sample_id=s.id and savrecorder.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE s.deleted=false AND #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

column.name: source
column.sql: w.title || ' | ' || case when substring(su.title from 1 for length(w.title)) = w.title then trim(substring(su.title from length(w.title)+1)) else su.title end

column.name: belongs_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(s.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#user_id#' AND su.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: belongs_to_site
column.sql: CASE WHEN su.website_id IN (#website_ids#) THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when s.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else s.input_form end
